/* WtrTrkMap.SelectWtrTrkList 저수조 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_RSRV_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.FNS_YMD >= #FNS_YMD_FROM#
A.FNS_YMD <= #FNS_YMD_TO#
A.PMS_YMD = #PMS_YMD#
A.RSR_NAM LIKE '%' || #RSR_NAM# || '%'
A.MNG_NAM LIKE '%' || #MNG_NAM# || '%'
A.BLD_ADR LIKE '%' || #BLD_ADR# || '%'
A.OWN_NAM LIKE '%' || #OWN_NAM# || '%'
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_CDE_NAM , A.FNS_YMD , A.PMS_YMD , A.BLS_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250037' AND DTL_CD = A.BLS_CDE ) AS BLS_NAM , A.RSR_NAM , A.OWN_NAM , A.OWN_ADR , A.OWN_TEL , A.MNG_NAM , A.MNG_ADR , A.MNG_TEL , A.BLD_ARA , A.TBL_ARA , A.FAM_CNT , A.BLD_ADR , A.SYS_CHK , CASE WHEN ST_ISVALID(A.GEOM) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_RSRV_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.FNS_YMD >= #FNS_YMD_FROM#
A.FNS_YMD <= #FNS_YMD_TO#
A.PMS_YMD = #PMS_YMD#
A.RSR_NAM LIKE '%' || #RSR_NAM# || '%'
A.MNG_NAM LIKE '%' || #MNG_NAM# || '%'
A.BLD_ADR LIKE '%' || #BLD_ADR# || '%'
A.OWN_NAM LIKE '%' || #OWN_NAM# || '%'
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

/* WtrTrkMap.SelectWtrTrkDtl 저수조 상세정보*/
SELECT A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_CDE_NAM , a.FNS_YMD , a.PMS_YMD , A.BLS_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250037' AND DTL_CD = A.BLS_CDE ) AS BLS_NAM , A.RSR_NAM , A.OWN_NAM , A.OWN_ADR , A.OWN_TEL , A.MNG_NAM , A.MNG_ADR , A.MNG_TEL , A.BLD_ARA , A.TBL_ARA , A.FAM_CNT , A.BLD_ADR , A.SYS_CHK , decode(A.SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM FROM INFOFMS.WTL_RSRV_PS A WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
statements.update: INSERT INTO INFOFMS.WTL_RSRV_PS ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , PMS_YMD , FNS_YMD , BLS_CDE , RSR_NAM , OWN_NAM , OWN_ADR , OWN_TEL , MNG_NAM , MNG_ADR , MNG_TEL , BLD_ARA , TBL_ARA , FAM_CNT , BLD_ADR , SYS_CHK ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #PMS_YMD# , #FNS_YMD# , #BLS_CDE# , #RSR_NAM# , #OWN_NAM# , #OWN_ADR# , #OWN_TEL# , #MNG_NAM# , #MNG_ADR# , #MNG_TEL# , #BLD_ARA# , #TBL_ARA# , #FAM_CNT# , #BLD_ADR# , #SYS_CHK# )

/* 저수조 상세 수정 */ UPDATE INFOFMS.WTL_RSRV_PS SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , PMS_YMD = #PMS_YMD# , FNS_YMD = #FNS_YMD# , BLS_CDE = #BLS_CDE# , RSR_NAM = #RSR_NAM# , OWN_NAM = #OWN_NAM# , OWN_ADR = #OWN_ADR# , OWN_TEL = #OWN_TEL# , MNG_NAM = #MNG_NAM# , MNG_ADR = #MNG_ADR# , MNG_TEL = #MNG_TEL# , BLD_ARA = #BLD_ARA# , TBL_ARA = #TBL_ARA# , FAM_CNT = #FAM_CNT# , BLD_ADR = #BLD_ADR# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#

MERGE INTO INFOFMS.WTL_RSRV_PS USING DUAL ON (FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , PMS_YMD = #PMS_YMD# , FNS_YMD = #FNS_YMD# , BLS_CDE = #BLS_CDE# , RSR_NAM = #RSR_NAM# , OWN_NAM = #OWN_NAM# , OWN_ADR = #OWN_ADR# , OWN_TEL = #OWN_TEL# , MNG_NAM = #MNG_NAM# , MNG_ADR = #MNG_ADR# , MNG_TEL = #MNG_TEL# , BLD_ARA = #BLD_ARA# , TBL_ARA = #TBL_ARA# , FAM_CNT = #FAM_CNT# , BLD_ADR = #BLD_ADR# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , PMS_YMD , FNS_YMD , BLS_CDE , RSR_NAM , OWN_NAM , OWN_ADR , OWN_TEL , MNG_NAM , MNG_ADR , MNG_TEL , BLD_ARA , TBL_ARA , FAM_CNT , BLD_ADR , SYS_CHK ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #PMS_YMD# , #FNS_YMD# , #BLS_CDE# , #RSR_NAM# , #OWN_NAM# , #OWN_ADR# , #OWN_TEL# , #MNG_NAM# , #MNG_ADR# , #MNG_TEL# , #BLD_ARA# , #TBL_ARA# , #FAM_CNT# , #BLD_ADR# , #SYS_CHK# )
/* 저수조 상세 삭제 */ DELETE INFOFMS.WTL_RSRV_PS WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
